title: B force on wires - wire A and 2 other wires

content.question: What is the direction of the net magnetic force on Wire <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"> <mtext>A</mtext> </math> due to the other two wires?

choices.label: Toward the bottom of the figure
Toward the top of the figure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
